mention.text: Motorist Rodney King 's night of terror at the hands of baton-wielding officers
other injuries suffered while being hit 56 times in a rain of baton blows
officers who stopped the Altadena motorist
Highway Patrol officers at the scene
three Highway Patrol officers and two school police officers.
the Highway Patrol later told investigators. ; The conflicting accounts are contained in hundreds of pages of confidential police reports
Koon , Powell , Wind and Officer Ted Briseno
Highway Patrol Officers Tim and Melanie Singer
the first half-dozen blows inflicted on King
him , `` Did you get any blood on your hands ? ''
malt liquor. ; As Melanie Singer approached King , she said Koon told her
